original_text: Except the Lord of hosts had left unto us a very small remnant, we should have been as Sodom, and we should have been like unto Gomorrah.
korean_text: 만군의 여호와께서 우리를 위하여 생존자를 조금 남겨 두지 아니하셨더면 우리가 소돔 같고 고모라 같았으리로다

sentences.original_text: Except the Lord of hosts had left unto us
we should have been as Sodom,
and we should have been like unto Gomorrah.
